alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:56PM EDT until July 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN GEAUGA AND EASTERN LAKE COUNTIES... At 555 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 26 miles northwest of North Kingsville to near Ashtabula to near Chesterland, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A 56 mph wind gust was measured at the Fairport Harbor Lighthouse. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Chardon, Madison, Perry, Kirtland, Montville, North Perry, Thompson, Kirtland Hills and North Madison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
